definitions.definition: To pursue in a manner to do harm or cruelty to; especially,   because of the victim's race, sexual identity, or adherence to a particular belief.
examples: He who persecutes one will persecute all.

definitions.definition: To harass with importunity ; to pursue with persistent solicitations ; to annoy.
To kill many of one species of animal, with the intent of removing them from human habitats.
examples: Humans have been persecuting wolves in this forest for centuries.

main_definition: To pursue in a manner to do harm or cruelty to; especially,   because of the victim's race, sexual identity, or adherence to a particular belief.
secondary_definitions: To harass with importunity ; to pursue with persistent solicitations ; to annoy.
To kill many of one species of animal, with the intent of removing them from human habitats.
